author: TV Guide
title: Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo!
text: Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo! NBC's trip down the yellow brick road is getting closer! The network released the first photo of the The Wiz Live's cast arm-in-arm making their way to the Emerald City in some stylish ... Comment Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 6:10 PM Updated at 8:11 PM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 6:10 PM Updated at 8:11 PM Â» Social News NBC's trip down the yellow brick road is getting closer! The network released the first photo of the The Wiz Live 's cast arm-in-arm making their way to the Emerald City in some stylish threads. Take a look above at David Alan Grier almost unrecognizable as the Cowardly Lion, Shanice Williams as Dorothy, Ne-Yo as the grinning Tin Man and Elijah Kelley as a colorful and spry Scarecrow. And don't forget little Toto trotting along. Find your new TV obsession! NBC's latest live musical special also stars Queen Latifah as the Wizard, Mary J. Blige as the Wicked Witch of the West, Uzo Aduba as Glinda the Good and Amber Riley as Glinda's sister, Addaperle, the Good Witch of the North. The Wiz Live airs on Thursday, Dec. 3 on NBC. Are you ready to ease on down the road with The Wiz Live ? What do you think of this crazy cool costuming? Other Links From TVGuide.com
